description:
Angular sunglasses with an industrial edge. Built on a precisely crafted frame of aluminum and magnesium, the Pello aren’t your average shades.

  • Antireflective coating on the inside of the lens reduces eye fatigue, especially in very bright environments
  • Frames use magnesium, aluminum and Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic, for an optimized balance of lightness and strength
  • Anti-slip nose pads help keep the glasses in place
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • 6-base lens curve provides great coverage without restricting air flow
name: Ryders Eyewear Pello Sunglasses - Unisex
